OldSchoolProblem.title: Still Doing It The Hard Way?
OldSchoolProblem.subtitle: This is how students in Belgium still hunt for jobs today...

step1.title: Printed paper CV
step1.description: You still have to print your CV every time you change it, just to drop it somewhere.

step2.title: Walking around everywhere
step2.description: You go from shop to shop without even knowing who is actually hiring students.

step3.title: CV given at random
step3.description: You hand your CV to everyone with no follow-up, just hoping it reaches the right person.

step4.title: Waiting with no news
step4.description: No answer, no feedback, just waiting for days hoping for a "lucky" phone call.

step5.title: Schedules you can't follow
step5.description: Your shifts live on paper or random WhatsApp messages, every change turns into chaos.
